name: CuriousCat
0:
”Alexa, ask Curious Cat to give me a fact.”
”Alexa, open Curious Cat and tell me a fact.”
”Alexa, open Curious Cat and tell me something.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: curious cat
des: Motivate kids in the morning to learn something new as they get ready for school - and to create discourse, share knowledge.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
